content: inspired by the charm of woodland gnomes and their legendary love of warm toes this pair was knitted for a dear friend who adores both ^^ cuff down socks with stranded colourwork the colourwork pattern and the toe are charted other instructions are written there are 6 row where 3 colours are used at the same time just grab your prefered beverage and go for it you ve got this sock width can easily be modified by decreasing more or less stitches on row 24 of the colourwork pattern the pattern is free and will always be it hasn t been tested just knitted twice by me so please contact me here or on instagram if you spot an error or need some help
